abstract: Shola Olatoye, chairwoman of New York City Housing Authority, often has her last name mispronounced by those who need to introduce her or welcome her in public appearances, including Mayor Bill de Blasio.
lead_paragraph: Shola Olatoye, chairwoman of the New York City Housing Authority, routinely hears her surname mispronounced, even by Mayor Bill de Blasio.

headline.main: A Name That Trips Up Many (Including Her Boss)
headline.print_headline: For City’s Housing Chief, a Name That Trips Up Many (Including Her Boss)
headline.seo: The Troubles Pronouncing Shola Olatoye, New York’s Housing Chief

snippet: Shola Olatoye, chairwoman of the New York City Housing Authority, routinely hears her surname mispronounced, even by Mayor Bill de Blasio.
